title: Unrestricted File Upload on https://app.lemlist.com

profile.name: lemlist
profile.about: lemlist is a powerful email outreach tool that gives you the ability to personalize pitches, automate follow-up, and track the success of your emails.

vulnerability_information:
## Summary:
Hi! i found an Unrestricted File Upload on https://app.lemlist.com which let me upload anything.
File Extensions Such as .html and others should not be executed on the server side.

## Steps To Reproduce:
[add details for how we can reproduce the issue]

* 1.) Login to https://app.lemlist.com
* 2.) Go to Settings >  Email Signature > Click the 3 Dots > Upload File
{F617850}
* 3.) Download {F617851} and Upload it 
* 4.) Right Click and Get the Link of the Uploaded File, Visit the Link.
{F617852}

## Impact

attacker can bypass upload restrictions and deface the page.
vulnerability_information_html:
Summary:

Hi! i found an Unrestricted File Upload on https://app.lemlist.com which let me upload anything.
File Extensions Such as .html and others should not be executed on the server side.

Steps To Reproduce:

[add details for how we can reproduce the issue]

  • 1.) Login to https://app.lemlist.com
  • 2.) Go to Settings > Email Signature > Click the 3 Dots > Upload File
  • 3.) Download page.html (F617851) and Upload it
  • 4.) Right Click and Get the Link of the Uploaded File, Visit the Link.

Impact

attacker can bypass upload restrictions and deface the page.

weakness.name: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type

activities.message:
Thanks for the report,
We will make upload request for the user API, so everybody will not be able to upload.
activities.markdown_message:
Thanks for the report,
We will make upload request for the user API, so everybody will not be able to upload.

activities.message: are you able to verify the issue? triage?
activities.markdown_message: are you able to verify the issue? triage?

activities.message:
Yes, the vulnerability was reproducible.
We will keep you up to date and inform you when the vulnerability will be fixed.
activities.markdown_message:
Yes, the vulnerability was reproducible.
We will keep you up to date and inform you when the vulnerability will be fixed.

activities.message:
The issue is now fixed and an API key must be provided to be able to send a file
Thanks a lot for your time
activities.markdown_message:
The issue is now fixed and an API key must be provided to be able to send a file
Thanks a lot for your time

activities.message:
Hey! the fix you guys implemented was incomplete.

i was able to bypass the file upload restrictions by changing the content type to 
text/html > image/png
activities.markdown_message:
Hey! the fix you guys implemented was incomplete.

i was able to bypass the file upload restrictions by changing the content type to
text/html > image/png

Here's the poc

Thanks for your hardwork :D

activities.message:
Thank you so much.
I reopen the report.
activities.markdown_message:
Thank you so much.
I reopen the report.

activities.message: Thanks for the reporting, we now check the real type of the file you try to upload and block it if it's not an image.
activities.markdown_message: Thanks for the reporting, we now check the real type of the file you try to upload and block it if it's not an image.
